name: Algebra I
subject: Math
description: Foundation for algebraic functions and equations. Builds understanding of functions and equations.

name: Algebra I, Applied Double Block
subject: Math
description: TEKS-based course building basic math foundations and concepts, increasing competency in algebraic functions and equations. ARD Committee placement.

name: Math Functional I, Algebra I
subject: Math
description: Builds basic math foundations and concepts, addressing real-life applications. ARD Committee placement.

name: Geometry
subject: Math
description: Study of geometric structures, logical reasoning, transformations, proof, coordinate geometry.

name: Geometry (Advanced)
subject: Math
description: Advanced study of geometric structures, logical reasoning, transformations, proof.

name: Geometry (TAG Advanced)
subject: Math
description: Advanced study for TAG students of geometric structures, logical reasoning, transformations, proof.

name: Geometry, Applied (Double Block)
subject: Math
description: TEKS-based course introducing geometric concepts, shapes, angles, and problem-solving. ARD Committee placement.

name: Geometry, A/B Applied (Single Block)
subject: Math
description: TEKS-based course introducing geometric concepts, shapes, angles, and problem-solving. ARD Committee placement.

name: Math Functional II, Geometry
subject: Math
description: Builds basic math foundations and concepts, addressing real-life applications including geometry. ARD Committee placement.

name: Algebra II
subject: Math
description: Broadens knowledge of quadratic, exponential, logarithmic, square root, cubic, cube root, absolute value, rational functions, systems, data analysis.

name: Algebra II (Advanced)
subject: Math
description: Advanced study of quadratic, exponential, logarithmic, square root, cubic, cube root, absolute value, rational functions, systems, data analysis.

name: Algebra II (TAG Advanced)
subject: Math
description: Advanced study for TAG students of quadratic, exponential, logarithmic, square root, cubic, cube root, absolute value, rational functions, systems, data analysis.

name: Algebra II (OnRamps College Algebra)
subject: Math
description: OnRamps dual enrollment course covering Algebra II and potentially earning UT credit for College Algebra.

name: Algebra II, Applied
subject: Math
description: Broadens knowledge of functions and systems for applied students. ARD Committee placement.

name: Math Functional IV, Algebra II
subject: Math
description: Builds basic math foundations and concepts, addressing real-life applications including Algebra II concepts. ARD Committee placement.

name: Precalculus
subject: Math
description: Uses functions, equations, and limits as tools for expressing generalizations and analyzing mathematical relationships.

name: Precalculus (Advanced)
subject: Math
description: Advanced study of functions, equations, and limits.

name: Precalculus (TAG Advanced)
subject: Math
description: Advanced study for TAG students of functions, equations, and limits.

name: Precalculus, AP
subject: Math
description: AP course developing rigorous symbolic manipulation skills focusing on various function types and exploring real-world data.

name: Precalculus, AP TAG
subject: Math
description: AP course for TAG students developing rigorous symbolic manipulation skills focusing on various function types and exploring real-world data.

name: Precalculus (OnRamps Discovery PreCalculus)
subject: Math
description: OnRamps dual enrollment using inquiry-based learning. Potentially earns UT credit.

name: Calculus
subject: Math
description: Extends experience with functions; studies limits, derivatives, integrals, Fundamental Theorem of Calculus. Reviews trigonometry/analytic geometry.

name: Calculus AB AP
subject: Math
description: AP Level: Focuses on differential calculus with limited exposure to early integral calculus concepts.

name: Calculus AB (TAG AP)
subject: Math
description: AP Level for TAG students: Focuses on differential calculus with limited exposure to early integral calculus concepts.

name: Calculus BC AP
subject: Math
description: AP Level: Covers Calculus AB topics plus an extensive study of integral calculus.

name: Calculus BC (TAG AP)
subject: Math
description: AP Level for TAG students: Covers Calculus AB topics plus an extensive study of integral calculus.

name: Multivariable Calculus
subject: Math
description: Studies limits, derivatives, integrals of multivariable functions; vector functions, multiple integrations, vector analysis, differential equations. TEA innovative course.

name: Statistics
subject: Math
description: Broadens knowledge of variability, sampling, experimentation, data (categorical/quantitative), probability, random variables, inference, bivariate data.

name: Statistics AP
subject: Math
description: AP Level: Covers descriptive/inferential statistics, probability, and study design with real-world applications.

name: Statistics (TAG AP)
subject: Math
description: AP Level for TAG students: Covers descriptive/inferential statistics, probability, and study design with real-world applications.

name: Statistics (OnRamps Elementary Statistical Methods)
subject: Math
description: OnRamps dual enrollment course potentially earning UT credit for Elementary Statistical Methods.

name: Advanced Quantitative Reasoning (AQR)
subject: Math
description: Emphasizes statistics, financial applications; uses algebra, geometry, trigonometry, discrete math for problem solving in context.

name: Algebraic Reasoning
subject: Math
description: Broadens knowledge of various functions through analysis, application, patterns, algebraic methods, modeling from data.

name: Algebraic Reasoning, Applied
subject: Math
description: Broadens knowledge of various functions through analysis, application, patterns, algebraic methods, modeling from data for applied students. ARD Committee placement.

name: Mathematical Models with Applications
subject: Math
description: Uses algebra, probability, statistics, geometry models for real-life problems (money, data, chance, patterns, music, design, science).

name: Math Modeling, Applied
subject: Math
description: Uses algebra, geometry, graphic models for real-life applications/problems (money, data, change, patterns, science). ARD Committee placement.

name: Math Functional III, Math Modeling
subject: Math
description: Builds basic math foundations and concepts, addressing real-life applications including mathematical modeling. ARD Committee placement.

name: Math, College Preparatory
subject: Math
description: Helps students become college ready in mathematics, fulfilling TSI requirements. Algebra II credit recommended.

name: Strategic Learning for High School Math
subject: Math
description: Designed to create strategic math learners, stimulate thinking about math approach, establish relevance via data/stats. May be paired with Algebra I.

name: Accounting I
subject: CTE/Elective
description: Investigate accounting field, standards, economic/financial/tech/social/legal/ethical factors. Process of recording/analyzing/communicating info. Potential QuickBooks cert.

name: Accounting II
subject: Math
description: Investigate accounting field, engage in managerial/cost accounting activities. Satisfies a math graduation requirement.

name: Computer Science A AP
subject: Math
description: AP Level: Solid understanding of algorithms, symbolic reasoning, logic, object-oriented programming (Java). Counts as 1 Math + 1 LOTE credit. LOTE shows P.

name: Digital Electronics (DE-PLTW)
subject: Math
description: Application of electronic logic circuits/devices, Boolean logic, analysis of digital circuitry. Satisfies a math graduation requirement. PLTW Curriculum.
